testcase.name: This is sceanario to match the first one and get Cucumber to give us a stub implementation of the second one.
The sum of a list of numbers should be calculated <Using Simple List>
A price list can be represented as price per item <Using Maps>
List of domain objects <Instead of Data Table - Using List>
testcase.system-out: Given I have the following order using list.................................passed Then I purchase 4 cucumber and 6 potato.....................................passed Then My cost is 14..........................................................passed
